name: Add DLLPathOverride Entry For Persistence
description: Detects when an attacker adds a new "DLLPathOverride" value to the "Natural Language" key in order to achieve persistence which will get invoked by "SearchIndexer.exe" process
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:*\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\ContentIndex\\Language\\* AND registry.path:(*\\StemmerDLLPathOverride* OR *\\WBDLLPathOverride* OR *\\StemmerClass* OR *\\WBreakerClass*))`
